referenceObject.reference: Signorotto, F. & Ferretti, N. (2026). Integrative taxonomy unveils a new lineage within Acanthogonatus centralis Goloboff, 1995 (Araneae, Mygalomorphae, Pycnothelidae): description of Acanthogonatus monicae sp. nov. from central Argentina. Evolutionary Systematics 10: 31-46. doi: 10.3897/evolsyst.10.172168
